description: Lucas Harris cuts in from the right wing and curls a shot into the far corner.
Brandon Hernandez receives a yellow card for a late tackle on Mason Walker.
Ryan Williams equalizes with a powerful header from a corner delivered by Michael Smith.
Elijah Gagnon comes on for Thomas Walker to add fresh legs up front.
Andrew Anderson gives Everglade FC the lead with a finesse shot from the left side.
Jacob Thompson is booked for dissent following a controversial foul call.
Thomas Brown levels the score with a spectacular long-range strike.
Ryan Brown replaces Michael Smith to add energy on the right wing.
Owen Campbell is brought on for Mason Walker to bolster the midfield.
Elijah Gagnon puts Fraser Valley United ahead with a close-range finish.
Matthew Martin equalizes in dramatic fashion with a header from a free-kick.
Joseph Thomas enters for Austin Jackson to strengthen the team's defense.
Ryan Williams receives a yellow card for time-wasting.
Everglade FC wins the penalty shootout 4-2, securing a spot in the final.
